I first bought these a while ago, and I loved them. Great look, great fit, surprisingly durable.  But the biggest selling point for me was that when something inevitably happened to them, I’d be able to come back to Amazon and buy a replacement pair!  And yet—no, I can’t!  Mine got damaged moshing at a music festival. (They were in the case in my pocket and still got damaged in the crush!) so I came here and reordered the same exact ones with green mirrored lenses.  But there is a LOT less mirroring and the lenses are now more blue than green. The arms move stiffly and the whole pair feels more cheaply made.  Sending them back in disappointment. The original set were a favorite pair!

My buddy left a pair in my car and once I tried them on I knew I wanted a pair.  His were scratched so I decided to get him a new pair as well.  I was surprised these were not more expensive!  I was also surprised with the packaging.  They came in a case, with a cloth to clean them, and the case was in a box.  I am not great at taking care of sunglasses, so for the quality and price point these are my new go to.

评论概述: Would be great if the lens coatings were more durable
评论详情: I bought these as my vacation shades and not have to worry if I lost them or if they got stolen.  I liked them so much I put them into my regular rotation.  At the 6 month mark the lens coatings started to peel.  I decided I could live it it but then it got worse and I just stopped wearing them altogether.  I'm not rough on them and take care of them as I would my more expensive pairs of Raybans and Oakley's.  If it weren't for the lenses, I would continue to buy these.  Hopefully they will make the coatings more durable but at the price point they are a decent value.

I wore these glasses nearly every day for the last two years and they stay in my vehicle when I am not wearing them. (I only wear them to drive.) To my shock, when I put them on one day last week, what you see in the above photo is what I found. It causes a Prizmic type glare in my eye.  I did not get anything on the lense to cause this and there is no way to feel the damage from either side of the lens, it is internal.  In my opinion, there is nothing I could have done to prevent this from happening as they do not get abused, and they do not sit in a hot car. (My car is parked in the shade or in a garage to protect it from extreme heat.)  I am curious if the company reads these reviews and gets back with the customers.

评论概述: Good Disposable Sunglasses...Expect To Throw Out
评论详情: I've bought a few of the Dubery’s because I have lost or broken high priced sunglasses. These kind of work  because the price is low and they're comfortable. That said, if using Dubery on vacation, especially in a pool, be advised that the lenses consistently DETERIORATE. I was recently on a vacation in Cancun and the issue shown happened for me and my son. The golden rule of "you get what you pay for" holds true again.

评论概述: Good value for the price, but very delicate lenses
评论详情: I avoid buying expensive sunglasses because I feel all sunglasses will break.  These are a good value, but the lense finish is really delicate especially when wearing sunscreen.  You would think SUNscreen wouldn't harm SUNglasses, but it will take the reflective finish right off.  I'm on my second pair for the season and the same thing happened to both.  I try to be careful, but the sweat and sunscreen inevitably get on the lenses and when I wipe it off, the finish goes with it, leaving what looks like black holes on the lenses.I have bought 8 pair already, but now I'm at the price of expensive sunglasses so I might need to look at other options.

For the price, you can’t beat it. We have sunglasses all over the house and cars and these are perfect - polarized but not so expensive I’ll be heartbroken when I eventually lose them. We even wear them in the pool and they’re holding up fine with the chlorine.
